comment: Although I am merely an anonymous blob on the internet to you, I happen to be the best ratemyprofessor user out there. With that said, listen to me and me alone and you will be well advised. Mary Kay is a really cool person, but I can see why her teaching methods are controversial. Do the work and there will be plenty of cushion. Don't, and yafail!
rating_tags: Participation matters--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Clear grading criteria

comment: I love MaryKay but she definitely makes you work for your grade. Shes super sweet and nice I took her 2 semesters ago and we still keep in touch. With that being said I got a B in her class based off the work I did, she doesnt grade based on whether or not she likes you, she grades fairly.

I would never take this class, again. E V E R ! Grading rubric is harsh. She'll  belittle you as if your the one asking stupid questions. She's sweet when she wants to be, but if it comes down to your way or hers, believe me, you will be ruled out! She has a my way or highway attitude, run. Someone needs to put her back in her place. Good riddance!
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: She will help you but she really doesn't know what she want,pretty confusing very very very nice lady though IF YOU CAN GET TO UNDERSTAND HER and if  she chooses a theme in the class that you can't shine on well good luck

Great teacher! Really cares about the students and their thoughts on her teaching styles. She really tries to adapt to whatever the students feel is this most effective. She cares about your grade, and makes sure that you have plenty of time to work on papers. Doesn't grade too hard and you only have 3 papers. Not much work. I recommend her!!

She is very nice and always willing to help you out. There is a ton of reading and a few essays. There is homework (writing) due every class. Participation is a must for her class so if you are on the shy side, like myself, you'll basically be forced to talk. Overall, the class was ok.

Professor McBrayer is an awesome English Professor! She is so bubbly and knowledgeable about what she teaches, and easily relates to her students. She is always there if you need help on a paper or feedback as well. Yes, there is a lot of reading, but there are 3 papers and as long as you don't do them last minute you will be fine!
She has no idea what she is doing
